anybody else notice jerky playback, i used vlc, media player classic but issue remains

You must use DTS to not get Cinavia messages.  When you convert to AC3, or other audio track, you will get Cinavia.  Your receiver must be capable of DTS over HDMI.

All SONY pictures will have Cinavia.
